00021 #include "calvin_files/array/src/ArrayMedia.h"
00022 //
00023 
00024 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_array;
00025 
00027 #define MEDIA_TYPE_CARTRIDGE std::wstring(L"Cartridge")
00028 
00030 #define MEDIA_TYPE_PLATE_OR_STRIP std::wstring(L"PlateOrStrip")
00031 
00032 /*
00033  * Convert the media type to a string.
00034  */
00035 std::wstring affymetrix_calvin_array::MediaToString(ArrayMedia media)
00036 {
00037         switch (media)
00038         {
00039         case CartridgeMedia:
00040                 return MEDIA_TYPE_CARTRIDGE;
00041                 break;
00042 
00043         case PlateOrStripMedia:
00044                 return MEDIA_TYPE_PLATE_OR_STRIP;
00045                 break;
00046 
00047         default:
00048                 return L"";
00049                 break;
00050         }
00051 }
00052 
00053 /*
00054  * Convert the string to media type.
00055  */
00056 ArrayMedia affymetrix_calvin_array::MediaFromString(const std::wstring &media)
00057 {
00058         if (media == MEDIA_TYPE_CARTRIDGE)
00059                 return CartridgeMedia;
00060         
00061         else if (media == MEDIA_TYPE_PLATE_OR_STRIP)
00062                 return PlateOrStripMedia;
00063 
00064         else
00065                 return CartridgeMedia;
00066 }
